sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论肢体制动加速了失神经支配肌肉萎缩的发展。

sentences.english: The taste is healthy, the vitality is abundant, then the muscle is plentiful, the body is strong.
sentences.chinese: 脾胃健，气血盛，则肌肉丰腴，肢体强劲。

sentences.english: He becomes more and more interested in exploring the possibility of a "non-dancing" body.
sentences.chinese: 他对“非舞蹈化”肢体的可能性愈加关注。

sentences.english: All limbs were performed with superficial venous operation and external valvuloplasty of femoral vein valve.
sentences.chinese: 所有肢体均行浅静脉手术加股静脉瓣膜外修复成形术。

sentences.english: Housemates must not threaten or use physical violence towards any other Housemate.
sentences.chinese: 房客们不可以威胁或使用肢体暴力对待其他房客。

sentences.english: When fracture of the wounded lower limbs is secured, limbs wants curved move to show bend ancon unbend to bind.
sentences.chinese: 伤员下肢骨折固定时，肢体要弯着呈屈肘状伸直捆绑。

sentences.english: Conclution Intervention and radiation are better therapies and as the ferst therapy for treatment osteosarcoma in limbs.
sentences.chinese: 结论介入加放疗是肢体骨肉瘤的较好治疗方法。

sentences.english: Because without realizing it, you are an expert in flirting and body language.
sentences.chinese: 因为你没有注意到，你是调情和肢体语言的专家。

sentences.english: The doctors tried to rehabilitate soldiers who had lost limbs during the war.
sentences.chinese: 医生们试图使战争中失去肢体的兵士恢复正常生活。

sentences.english: Back and knees, body weight difficulties.
Thanks to either manmade or natural dangers, animals often lose limbs.
sentences.chinese: 动物经常在天灾人祸中弄得肢体残缺不全。

sentences.english: Next, the researchers stimulated both the affected and unaffected limb at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 下一步，研究人员同时刺激麻木与不麻木的肢体。

sentences.english: Using the right body language helps you communicate more assertively.
sentences.chinese: 使用正确的肢体语言会帮助你更有主张力的交流。

sentences.english: She, in her place, refused him any help, With the least stiffening of her neck in silence.
sentences.chinese: 她在那里，拒绝了他的帮助，她安静下来，肢体僵硬。

sentences.english: First, we'll examine some nonverbal signs of lying.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们探讨一些肢体上的征兆。

sentences.english: Show you’re listening by your nonverbal communication.
sentences.chinese: 用你的肢体语言表明你正在聆听。

definition: the four limbs of the body
